methods.name: void toggleFreeformWindowingMode()
methods.comment:
* Moves the activity between {@link WindowConfiguration#WINDOWING_MODE_FREEFORM} windowing
         * mode and {@link WindowConfiguration#WINDOWING_MODE_FULLSCREEN}.

methods.name: void enterPictureInPictureModeIfPossible()
methods.comment:
* Puts the activity in picture-in-picture mode if the activity supports.
         * @see android.R.attr#supportsPictureInPicture

methods.name: boolean isTaskRoot()
methods.comment: Returns whether the window belongs to the task root.

methods.name: void updateStatusBarColor(int color)
methods.comment: * Update the status bar color to a forced one.

methods.name: void updateNavigationBarColor(int color)
methods.comment: * Update the navigation bar color to a forced one.
